Slide and hold
here to move

Tap on the device when
its glowing to activate it

You have to reach the Light
Tower on the right direction

Tap to get the colour of
the Light with your staff

Tap on the portal
to teleport

You will need specific light colours
to activate some elements
Find the three Orbs of each world!
Slide and hold on the left side of the screen to move
Tap on the right side of the screen to jump
You can't activate the Light Tower with your feet!
Activate the devices when they are glowing
Get enough Orbs to unlock new levels
Collect every coin to reach the highest score

Jump to the upper side, or fall to the bottom side,
and you will find a new perspective of the world
Use the portals to reach remote areas

If you can't activate the Light Tower,
find an Altar where light your staff
Game Art and Visual Design Directors:
JAVIER SAN JUAN - JON BELTR^N DE HEREDIA

Hi, little Ovi. My name is Libu,
your guardian spirit.

I can talk to you thanks
to your sacred cane.

My task is to protect you and
to make sure you accomplish

your mission as the Light Bearer.
We have a lot to do!

Ovi, that great energy ball is an Orb.
There are several Orbs spread

throughout the cosmos. Gather them
all so you can travel to other worlds.

Gemstones! Collect all of them
and the Ancestral Masters

will reward you for your
great job.

There it is! The Light Tower. Though 
being an apprentice, you'll know

the importance of kindling them.
Each lit Tower is a star in the sky.

This is the only way to preserve
life and peace in the universe.

Light bearers have the power
to adapt to the many orientations

of the different worlds,
don't be afraid of jumping!

The worlds have been darkened
for so long that the creatures

dwelling them have been corrupted
and turned poisonous.

Don't kill them...
And don't touch them!
A new landscape! What a relief!

Beware, Ovi. As light is fading
the worlds are becoming

more dangerous. But we are close
to the end. Light them!

Ovi, that thorns are dangerous.
Be careful with touching them!
